summary: Browser Tab Opening with MCP Playwright Tools

message.content: opena  brwoser window and check which profile it is using

content.text: I'll help you open a browser window and check which profile is being used. Let me use the Playwright browser tools to do this.

### Ran Playwright code
```js
await page.goto('chrome://version/');
```

content.text:
The browser is using a temporary Playwright profile. The profile path shows:

**Profile Path:** `/private/var/folders/nh/ntnp7jh91319djtv14qxxb0m0000gp/T/playwright_chromiumdev_profile-T6Kr2l/Default`

This is a temporary profile created by Playwright for automated browser testing, not your regular Chrome profile. It's located in the system's temporary folder and will be cleaned up when the browser session ends.
